name: Andy & The Leaf World
description:
GAME-QUEST

Andy must set out on a quest to deliver a powerful sword to the King. which makes the most powerful weapon when combined with a red gem, which only he can use to destroy all enemies and restore peace in the leaf kingdom.

Quest-Completion

Team-up with the princess on the rest of your journey to complete the mission.

MUSIC TRACKS

 Planning by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

The Lone Wolf by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Wintersong by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Neverland by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Adventure by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

ForestWalk by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

SYSTEM RECOMMENDATION

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

OS: Windows 10

CPU(64-bit): Intel Core i5 or Higher...

Memory: 8GB RAM

Storage: 10 GB available space
